text: Son of the Nile ( translit. Ibn El Nil) is a 1951 Egyptian romantic drama movie directed by Youssef Chahine and starring Shukry Sarhan, Faten Hamama, Yehia Chahine, Mahmoud El-Meliguy, Nader Galal. ==Other websites== * Category:1951 romantic drama movies Category:Egyptian movies Category:Movies directed by Youssef Chahine
title: Son of the Nile
